entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse Just want you to know that of my 5 black sons, none drink, smoke or take drugs. A black friend of one of my sons died from #covid19 he didn’t drink, smoke or take drugs, you darn moron. Go get your soul back from Trump & retract this stupid  ‘stereotypical’ statement! #Disgusting
